div.p: While this date-time value is formatted correctly, it either appears to be in the future, or far enough in the past to indicate that there might either be a software error, or an incorrectly set clock, involved.
Note that many clients sort by dates, either by default, or as an option. For this reason, it is important that date values are as accurate as possible.
Ensure that atom:updated and atom:published entries are as accurate.
